  • Method Details

    • addRoad

      boolean addRoad​(String start, String destination, double distance)
      Adds a road between two locals.
      Parameters:
      start - the start local
      destination - the distination local
      distance - the distance of the road
      Returns:
      true if the road is added, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or destination are null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if the distance is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no locations

    • removeRoad

      boolean removeRoad​(String start, String destination)
      Removes a road between two locals.
      Parameters:
      start - the start local
      destination - the distination local
      Returns:
      true if the road is removed, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or destination are null or blank
      IllegalStateException - if there are no locations

    • setRoadDistance

      boolean setRoadDistance​(String start, String destination, double distance)
      Sets the road distance between two Locals.
      Parameters:
      start - the start local
      destination - the destination local
      distance - the distance between the locals
      Returns:
      true if the distance was changed, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or destination are null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if the distance is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no locations

    • generateRouteForSeller

      Iterator<ILocal> generateRouteForSeller​(ILocal start, ISeller seller)
      Generates the shortest route for the seller considering the markets that he has to visit.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting point of the route
      seller - the seller
      Returns:
      the Locals iterator representing the route
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or seller are null
      IllegalStateException - if there are no locations

    • printRouteForSeller

      void printRouteForSeller​(ILocal start, ISeller seller)
      Prints the shortest route for the seller considering the markets that he has to visit.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting point of the route
      seller - the seller
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the start or seller are null
      IllegalStateException - if there are no locations

    • printRoads

      void printRoads()
      Prints the roads to the console.
